C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: Google, IndentWidth: 2, AllowShortCaseLabelsOnASingleLine: true, AlignConsecutiveAssignments: true, AlignConsecutiveMacros: true, AlignEscapedNewlines: Left, AlignTrailingComments: true, AllowShortBlocksOnASingleLine: true, AllowShortEnumsOnASingleLine: true, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: Always, AllowShortLambdasOnASingleLine: All, AllowShortLoopsOnASingleLine: true, BinPackArguments: true, BinPackParameters: true, BitFieldColonSpacing: After, BreakBeforeBraces: Attach, BreakStringLiterals: true, ColumnLimit: 72, ContinuationIndentWidth: 2, IndentCaseBlocks: false, IndentCaseLabels: false, SpaceAfterCStyleCast: false, SpaceAfterLogicalNot: false, SpaceAroundPointerQualifiers: Default, SpaceBeforeAssignmentOperators: true, SpaceBeforeParens: ControlStatements, SpaceBeforeSquareBrackets: false, SpaceInEmptyBlock: false, SpaceInEmptyParentheses: false, SpacesBeforeTrailingComments: 4, SpacesInCStyleCastParentheses: false, SpacesInConditionalStatement: false, SpacesInContainerLiterals: false, SpacesInParentheses: false, SpacesInSquareBrackets: false, TabWidth: 2, UseTab: Never }
